# HaythServ — Cube 2: Sauerbraten server modification. ## Installation To install the product, you just have to type following code in your terminal:
```sh git clone https://github.com/Gnaoprr/HaythServ.git cd HathServ chmod +x ./install.sh ./install.sh ``` ### Configuration To configure the product, type following code in your terminal: ```sh nano conf/server.conf ``` then edit the configuration file, set server name, message of the day and others, then save file. ## Starting/Stopping the server ### Starting the server To start the server, just type the following code in your terminal: ```sh ./bin/server start ``` ### Stopping the server To stop the server, just type ```sh ./bin/server stop ``` in your terminal. ### Other things with the server #### Upload the server's configuration file To update the configuration file, type ```sh ./bin/server updateconf ``` in the terminal. #### Restart the server And, also, to restart the server, just type ```sh ./bin/server restart ``` in the terminal. #### Change the server's admin password Just type ```sh ./bin/server password new_password ``` in your terminal to change the server's admin password. ## Authors and Contributors Project created in 2013, @Gnaoprr.
